description:
Welcome to this course Learn Critical Path Analysis!

Planning, Scheduling and Controlling are three important functions of Management. PERT and CPM models are extremely useful for the purpose of Planning, Scheduling and controlling the progress and completion of large and complex projects.

In this course, you will learn about

a) General Frame work of CPM (Critical Path Method) and PERT (Program Evaluation Review Technique)

b) Advantage of Critical Path Analysis

c) Fundamentals of Critical Path Analysis

d) Conventions adopted in drawing Networks

e) Graphical representations of Events and Activities

f) Fundamental properties governing Events and Activities

g) Logical sequencing and connection of activities

h) Errors in logical sequencing

i) Dependency relationships by means of Network Diagrams

j) Network Construction - Case Studies

k) Critical Path Analysis - Systematic Analysis

l) Forward Pass Computations

m) Backward Pass Computations

n) Critical Path Determination

o) Calculation of Floats

This course is structured in self paced learning style.

Video lectures are used for delivering the course content.

CA Final Students and CMA Students are the target audience.

MBA Finance and Project Management students can also take this course.

Take this course to understand the basics to advanced concepts in Critical Path Analysis.
title: Learn Critical Path Analysis for CA / CS  Professional exams
instructors: CA Raja Natarajan, B.Com., PGDBA, FCA
